channel.title: Gadgets
channel.description:
so i was looking on www.dealextreme.com at random gadgets earlier. i found some cool shit.
http://www.dealextreme.com/details.dx/sku.15823 spy pen (video & audio recorder) inside the pen, 2gb mem too.
http://www.dealextreme.com/details.dx/sku.21934 007 watch, had no idea this stuff was real, going to buy this one
http://www.dealextreme.com/details.dx/sku.17606 lock pick gun, always wanted to try out some lockpicking, looking at youtube videos it seems hell easy to break into stuff.
only checked out 2 sections so far of dealextreme, lookin for more tomorrow. thoughts on any of this stuff?
